details: C is a general-purpose programming language that is extremely popular, simple, and flexible to use.
It explores the bedrock principles of computer science, including sorting, searching, and intricate graph algorithms.
C++ is one of the most demanding programming languages, which is used by over 4 million programmers worldwide.
A data structure is a specialized format for organizing, processing, retrieving and storing data.
OOP is a method of structuring a program by bundling related properties and behaviors into individual objects.
It deals with the featured design, development, testing, and maintenance of software applications.
World's most comprehensive and broadly adopted cloud, offering over 200 fully featured services from data centers.
Logical data model, with objects such as data tables, views, rows, and columns, offers a flexible environment.
Identifying a problem, developing an algorithm and finally executing the algorithm to develop a program.
